Once upon a time, a tiny raindrop named Ripple tumbled from a fluffy cloud high in the sky. As she fell, she danced with the wind, swirling and twirling through the air. Landing softly on a vibrant leaf, she marveled at the world around her.
Ripple quickly rolled off the leaf and joined a babbling brook, where she met other raindrops. Together, they flowed over rocks and under bridges, laughing as they traveled.
Eventually, Ripple reached the vast ocean, where she joined countless other drops. Together, they formed waves, dreaming of the next journey back to the sky.
